channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple significant potholes in road, 19th April
item.description:
Just after the roundabout as you descend hill
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Partial failure of bridge structure, 19th April
item.description:
The bridge on the footpath connecting North Road East to Hatherley Lane and ASDA Cheltenham has significant subsidence on one side which is well over an inch deep in places and at least one metre long.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Roxton Drive, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 19th April
item.description:
LH lane filter traffic light - green arrow - is not illuminating. Cars are waiting for a signal to filter left into St George's Rd but the light isn't working
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Pothole has reappeared for the third time, 19th April
item.description:
Repair has not survived, outside 315 Innsworth Lane. Cars are swerving to avoid it..has been repaired recently..please can this be seen and warning signs placed, thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 323, Innsworth Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
